ISSUE.TITLE: update Azure.Identity
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug ### To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to 'build sln' 2. See error D:\a\OrchardCore\OrchardCore\src\OrchardCore\OrchardCore.Configuration.KeyVault\OrchardCore.Configuration.KeyVault.csproj : error NU1902: Warning As Error: Package 'Azure.Identity' 1.10.4 has a known moderate severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-wvxc-855f-jvrv [D:\a\OrchardCore\OrchardCore\OrchardCore.sln] ### Expected behavior update to 1.11.0, pass build ### Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Reduce contention by caching shellsetting accessors (#15728)
